        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">La strada verso una sempre più grande Europa</string>
            <string language="en">The path to a larger and larger European Union</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Pfad zu einem größeren und größeren 
europäischen Anschluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La voie d'accès à une plus grande et plus grande
union européenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O trajeto a uma união européia maior e maior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μονοπάτι σε μια μεγαλύτερη και μεγαλύτερη 
Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El camino a una unión europea más grande y más 
grande</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Cruciverba che rinforza la conoscenza sulla fase storica che ha registrato l'allargamento dell'Unione Europea a dieci ulteriori paesi il 1 Maggio 2004.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword which reinforces knowledge concerning the historical phase which witnessed the Enlargement of the European Union to ten more countries on May 1st, 2004.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Berlino</string>
            <string language="en">Berlin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Europa dell'Est</string>
            <string language="en">Eastern Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Europa occidentale</string>
            <string language="en">Western Europe</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="it">Lussemburgo</string>
            <string language="en">Luxembourg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Muro di Berlino</string>
            <string language="en">Berlin Wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">paesi candidati</string>
            <string language="en">candidate countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Turchia</string>
            <string language="en">Turkey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">quinto allargamento</string>
            <string language="en">fifth enlargement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">programma PHARE</string>
            <string language="en">PHARE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Convenzione</string>
            <string language="en">Convention</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel, das das Wissen hinsichtlich ist 
der historischen Phase verstärkt, die die Vergrößerung des 
europäischen Anschlußes zu 10 weiteren Ländern an Mai 1. zeugte, 
2004.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé qui renforcent la connaissance au 
sujet de la phase historique qui était témoin de l'agrandissement de
l'union européenne à dix pays supplémentaires le 1er mai, 2004.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword que reforça o conhecimento a respeito 
da fase histórica que testemunhou a ampliação da união européia a
dez mais países maio em 1o, 2004.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο που ενισχύει τη γνώση σχετικά με την 
ιστορική φάση που βεβαίωσε τη διεύρυνση της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης 
σε δέκα περισσότερες χώρες σε Μάιος 1$ος, το 2004.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crucigrama que refuerza el conocimiento referente 
a la fase histórica que atestiguó la ampliación de la unión 
europea a diez más países 1 de mayo de 2004.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivi didattici e pedagogici: gli studenti ripasseranno la loro conoscenza della fase storica che ha registrato l'allargamento dell'Unione Europea a dieci ulteriori paesi il 1 Maggio 2004. Campo di approccio pedagogico: 14-25 Tempo: 45 minuti Procedura: gli studenti possono lavorare individualmente, in coppie o in gruppi di 3-4. Devono leggere tutte le definizioni all'inizio. Questo LO può essere usato da altri insegnanti in molti modi differenti secondo la situazione didattica, gli obiettivi, gruppi di età, pre-conoscenze, numero di alunni nella classe, numero dei computer nel laboratorio, tempo di esecuzione, ecc.</string>
            <string language="en">Instructional and Pedagogical Objectives

Students will revise their knowledge on the historical phase which witnessed the Enlargement of the European Union to ten more countries on May 1st, 2004.

Pedagogical Approach

Age range: 14-25
Timing - 45 minutes.
The procedure :
Students can work individually, in pairs or in groups of 3-4. They go through all the definitions. This LO may be used by other teachers in many different ways depending on their teaching situation, their objective, age group, previous knowledge, number of students in the class, number of computers in the lab, given timing etc...</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
